'''Night of Serenity in the Sandy Breeze''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Night of Serenity in the Sandy Breeze is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating Geo [[Fungi]] near the [[Setekh Wenut]].
